snippet.title: Tormented Souls | Classic Survival Horror | Coming to Steam & Consoles in 2021
snippet.description:
SOMETHING EVIL LURKS AT WINTERLAKE
While investigating the disappearance of twin girls at Winterlake - something terrible happens to Caroline Walker.

Waking in the dead of night, naked in a bathtub - and hooked up to some decrepit medical equipment, Caroline must fight for her life as she explores the halls of an abandoned Mansion turned hospital.

Find out more: 
http://pqube.co.uk/tormented-souls
Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1367590/Tormented_Souls/ 

Follow PQube Games on social media!
Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/
